data.title: Sophie Luise of Mecklenburg
data.text:
Sophie Luise of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (Sofie Luise; 6 May 1685 – 29 July 1735) was Queen consort in Prussia by marriage to King Frederick I of Prussia. She was famed for her beauty.

Marriage[edit]

On 28 November 1708 she married King Frederick I in Prussia. They had no issue.

Titles[edit]

6 May 1685 – 28 November 1708 Princess Sophie Luise of Mecklenburg-Schwerin.

28 November 1708 – 25 February 1713 Her Majesty The Queen.

25 February 1713 – 29 July 1735 Her Majesty The Dowager Queen.

Sophie Luise of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Cadet branch of the House of Mecklenburg

Born: 6 May 1685 Died: 21 January 1735 German royalty Vacant
